Posts.Content: CrazyAunt1 wrote: My Onc has referred me to a lymphadema clinic but I'm on a waiting list - number 20 - to get an appointment. Does anyone have any suggestions as to what I can do while I wait to get an appointment? I have LE in my left breast area and around my side under my arm. It's getting painful under my arm. Any suggestions would be appreciated. CrazyAunt Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What to do? CrazyAunt1 inspiewriter

Posts.Content: CrazyAunt1 wrote: I'm not sure if I have lymphedema or not. I don't have swelling in my arm, but ever since my surgery (bil mast 7/12) I've had swelling in my left breast area. There is no infection. It's also hard. My oncologist said it could be lymphedema. Has anyone else had this and what did you do about it? CrazyAunt Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not sure... CrazyAunt1 Ontario
